name: HBO Feature Presentation (Identity Theme)
description: Schillinger analysis of the classic HBO 'Feature Presentation' theme - demonstrates how to create musical inevitability and authority through pure structural means, without traditional harmony or melody. Perfect for logos, identities, and transitions.
performance_notes: The key here is acceleration without tempo change - achieve this through rhythmic interference patterns (pulse every 8 units overlaid with pulse every 5 units). Keep pitch material extremely economical - narrow band, perfect intervals only. The harmony should 'unveil' rather than progress - you're approaching a static field, not moving through changes. Form is one-directional: no returns, no reprises. High frequencies = proximity, low frequencies = distance.

tempo.note: No tempo change - acceleration is rhythmic, not metric

rhythm.note: Resultant creates perceived acceleration without tempo change

harmony.note: Listener approaches harmony, harmony doesn't move

form.note: Mirrors physical motion, not musical form

orchestration.note: As piece progresses, increase high freq to create 'approaching' feeling

preset_evolution.note: Identity themes must be consistent - evolution disabled
